definition: ten thousand deaths will not prevent me (idiom); ready to risk life and limb to help out
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: Your self is sacrificed to the opinions and predilections of others.
sentences.chinese: 最終，你爲了他人的偏好和評價而萬死不辭。

sentences.english: I shall die again and again to know that life is inexhaustible.
sentences.chinese: 爲了弄明白生是無窮無盡的，我將萬死不辭。
